name: Rewinder (blep11, Baharto)
description: Use WASD to move and E to shoot enemies or left joystick and A on controler. If you die you restart to the beginning but if you reach the end you rewind your position but you go to the next level. (Our artist left the group so we used some of this https://scut.itch.io/7drl-tileset-2018)
